title: Michigan Coach Jim Harbaugh Speaks at Anti-Abortion Event
description: The remarks by Harbaugh, who was quoted as saying, “I believe in having the courage to let the unborn be born,” run counter to those expressed by the university’s interim president.
dc:creator: The New York Times
category: Dobbs v Jackson Women's Health Organization (Supreme Court Decision)
media:description: Jim Harbaugh and his wife spoke at an anti-abortion fund-raiser on Sunday.
